name: @stawen/azure-certificate
description: Pulumi dynamic provider for Azure App Service Certificate
author: Stanislas DRAUNET

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.version-changelog-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version-git-add && npm run version-changelog
scripts.version-changelog-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version-git-add && npm run version-changelog
scripts.version-changelog-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version-git-add && npm run version-changelog
scripts.version-git-add: git add package.json && git add package-lock.json
scripts.version-changelog: version-changelog CHANGELOG.md --remote=github && changelog-verify CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Changelog update"
